skills.name: Vehement Blow
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 30s] Pulls in nearby enemies and paralyzes them for 5.0 sec. For a period of 5 sec. after casting this skill, the next attack deals and additional 1000% ATK of Physical DMG to the target and nearby enemies and knocks them airborne.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 50, gain 40.0% DEF. Attacks against BIO-type enemies gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier.
